job_tasks.phrase: explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies that allow for secure, distributed AI computations
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the exploration of a new technical domain (AI and MPC) with the goal of developing novel techniques, indicating a need to understand the strategic advantage and business implications of this intersection.

job_tasks.phrase: design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing
job_tasks.justification: Designing and executing a roadmap implies understanding business goals and translating them into a technical strategy for a specific area (AI and confidential computing).

job_tasks.phrase: report to Nillion's AI Product Lead
job_tasks.justification: Reporting to a Product Lead suggests a connection to product strategy and business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: strong background in generative AI models
job_tasks.justification: Directly indicates expertise and involvement in generative AI models.
This phrase directly refers to the implementation and adaptation of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the task of modifying and optimizing AI model architectures, which falls under modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
job_tasks.justification: Implementing model architectures is a core modeling task.
Developing methodologies implies creating practical, implementable processes or frameworks, which aligns with software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate their feedback in our AI roadmap
job_tasks.justification: Integrating feedback from developers into a roadmap involves software development practices for iteration and improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows
job_tasks.justification: Creating tools and workflows is a direct software development responsibility.
While not explicitly MLOps, ensuring secure and distributed computations implies considerations for deployment and operational environments.

soft_skills.phrase: in close collaboration with our AI and cryptography team
work closely with our cryptography team
regular touchpoints with AI developers on the Nillion network
work closely with our DevRel team
getting up to speed with the technical nuances
explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies
adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way
design & execute a technical AI roadmap
actively contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes 'generative AI models' and the development of applications around them, including adapting architectures and implementing them within toolkits. The focus on creating AI tools and workflows, coupled with the use of frameworks like MPC (often integrated into GenAI applications), strongly aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
